bogdan_calmac wrote:
> 
> 
> The <batchtest> element in the ant task relies on a fileset with the
> sources/classes in order to determine the tests to run.
> 
> In my project I need to be able to run the tests from the distribution
> image, where the sources/classes are packaged as a jar file.
> 
> The question is if there's any trick to have the junit task pick up
> the tests from a jar file (as opposed to a directory).
> 
> Thanks in advance,
> 
> Bogdan Calmac.

JUnit-addons' ArchiveSuiteBuilder does this. You write one Java class 
once, then invoke it using the plain-vanilla <junit> Ant task.
